title: Breakingviews TV: Valuing Ant
text:
Breakingviews TV: Valuing Ant Tuesday, April 10, 2018 - 03:51 
Ant Financial, the Alibaba affiliate, may be worth up to $150 billion in private markets. John Foley and Richard Beales suggest ways to value the financial conglomerate that could get investors there – if they want to be persuaded. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Ant Financial, the Alibaba affiliate, may be worth up to $150 billion in private markets. John Foley and Richard Beales suggest ways to value the financial conglomerate that could get investors there – if they want to be persuaded.
